meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>gun</kanji>'s <kanji>bullet</kanji> is a <vocabulary>bullet</vocabulary>, though this word can specifically refer to a <vocabulary>rifle bullet</vocabulary> as well (probably because it was mostly rifles that people had way back in the day).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
